reviewText: Complete waste of my money! ....  the cover picture is deceiving. The actual performance is from a much earlier vintage w/ Gord concert show with him nor the venue the best.
I was so glad to have another DVD by this wonderful artist!
Great songs from the #1 singer-songwriter of all time, recorded in his prime. Only wish Soundstage hadn't cut the rest of Canadian Railroad Trilogy.
Really poor quality in both sound and video.  Steer clear.  Too bad, Gordon Lightfoot is a legend.

The cover photo seemingly shows his latest Gordon with long hair  but the concert  recorded  in the DVD shows his old concert he performed in his younger days.  This is very much misleading and deceiving.
It is very difficult to find early live Lightfoot concerts. For it's age it is a good quality of recording and great selection of his best know songs.
